Description:
Detects the WMI Event Consumer service scrcons.exe creating a named pipe

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: WMI Event Consumer Created Named Pipe
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\scrcons.exe'
